name: 張正春
objective: This course is to introduce basic theorems and concepts of optimization methods, and their engineering applications. The course will cover subjects such as:  (1) Unconstrained optimization, (2) Constrained optimization, (3) Convex programming, (4)Newton and steepest-descent methods, (5)Iterative numerical optimization algorithms, and (6) Engineering applications.
